title: Requires stores that sell meat, poultry or seafood to place a conspicuous sign informing consumers of their right to know when the food was cut and packaged
summary: Requires stores that sell meat, poultry or seafood to place a conspicuous sign informing consumers of their right to know when the food was cut and packaged.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to providing notice of packaging date for meats, poultry and seafood
